ussr.physics
Interface SimulationGadget

All Known Subinterfaces:
SimulationGadget.Textual
public interface SimulationGadget

A simulation gadget is a plugin that allows some aspect of the user interface to be tailored to the specific simulation that is running

Author:
ups

Nested Class Summary
static interface SimulationGadget.Host
          The host provides an interface and utility functionality for a simulation gadget
static interface SimulationGadget.Textual
          A textual simulation gadget implements user interactions specified through a textual interface
